text: Would you like to follow up with a sales rep?
Forty-two (42) of course is a pronic number[1] and an abundant number; its prime factorization 2 路 3 路 7 makes it the second sphenic number and also the second of the form (2 路 3 路 r).
Would you like to follow up w/ith a sales rep?
